Dhafer L'Abidine (Arabic: , nke a na-akpọkwa Dhaffer L'Abedine, Zafer El-Abedin na Dhafer El Abidine; a mụrụ na 26 Nọvemba 1972) bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri na onye bụbu onye na-agba epeleọkpa.
Dhafer mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na UK mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Birmingham School of Acting Ọ pụtara na Sky One's Dream Team, BBC's Spooks na ITV's The Bill

O mekwara ihe nkiri na "The Mark of Cain" dịka Omar Abdullah na A Hologram for the King Ọ ghọrọ onye a ma ama na Tunisia mgbe ọ rụchara ọrụ "Dali" na usoro Tunisia a na-akpọ "Maktoub". O mechara sonye na ihe nkiri na mba ndị Arab, ọkachasị na Egypt, UAE na Lebanon gụnyere ihe ngosi na usoro dịka "Taht Al Saytara", "Prince of Poets", na "Arous Beirut"
